Sweetest Gal Pal Lollipop Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card

Top 10! Sweetest Gal Pal Lollipop Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card – Valentines Day Cards This item is trending! Sweetest Gal Pal Lollipop Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card if you are looking for it, we recommend it Sweetest Gal Pal Lollipop Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Card You can order itThis funny and cute Valentine’s Day card is a light and sweet way to show your friend love on this special holiday. It features the phrase, "You’re the gal pal ever!" with a hand-drawn mason jar full of lollipop candy with a ribbon and heart top of a simple blush pink background and white frame. You can customize the message on the back to say whatever you’d like. The color scheme includes blush pink, medium pink, mauve, bright red, and white. It’s fun, modern, trendy, sweet, adorable, and cool.

***IMPORTANT DESIGN NOTE: For any custom design request such as matching product requests, color changes, placement changes, or any other change request, please click on the "MESSAGE" button or email the designer directly at [email protected]. You can even email her a request for a completely custom and new design. Price:$2.61
